languages.text:
While a voidborn character has more than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, all chances of all creatures (including enemies) in a 3-cell radius are increased by +10%.
While a voidborn character has less than 50% wounds, all chances of all creatures (including enemies) in a 3-cell radius are decreased by −10%.
languages.original_text:
Когда у пустотнорожденного персонажа больше 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, любые шансы всех существ (включая враждебных) в радиусе 3 клеток от него увеличиваются на 10%.
Когда у пустотнорожденного персонажа меньше 50% здоровья, любые шансы всех существ (включая враждебных) в радиусе 3 клеток уменьшаются на 10%.

traits.locale_text:
While a void born character has more than 50% wounds, all chances of all creatures (including enemies) in a 3-cell radius are increased by +10%.
While a void born character has less than 50% wounds, all chances of all creatures (including enemies) in a 3-cell radius are decreased by −10%.

While a voidborn character has more than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, all chances of all creatures (including enemies) in a 3-cell radius are increased by +10%.
While a voidborn character has less than 50% wounds, all chances of all creatures (including enemies) in a 3-cell radius are decreased by −10%.

While a voidborn character has more than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, all chances of all creatures (including enemies) in a 3-cell radius are increased by +10%.
While a voidborn character has less than 50% wounds, all chances of all creatures (including enemies) in a 3-cell radius are decreased by −10%.

languages.text:
Solange ein Leerengeborener mehr als 50 % {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} hat, werden alle Chancen aller Kreaturen (einschließlich Gegner) in einem Radius von 3 Feldern um +10 % erhöht.
Wenn ein Leerengeborener weniger als 50 % Wunden hat, werden alle Chancen aller Kreaturen (einschließlich Gegner) in einem Radius von 3 Feldern um −10 % verringert.
languages.original_text:
While a voidborn character has more than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, all chances of all creatures (including enemies) in a 3-cell radius are increased by +10%.
While a voidborn character has less than 50% wounds, all chances of all creatures (including enemies) in a 3-cell radius are decreased by −10%.

traits.locale_text:
Solange ein Leerengeborener mehr als 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} hat, werden alle Chancen aller Kreaturen (einschließlich Gegner) in einem Radius von 3 Feldern um +10% erhöht.
Wenn ein Leerengeborener weniger als 50% Wunden hat, werden alle Chancen aller Kreaturen (einschließlich Gegner) in einem Radius von 3 Feldern um −10% verringert.

languages.text:
Lorsque la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} d'un personnage hors-monde est supérieure à 50 %, toutes les chances de l'ensemble des créatures (y compris les ennemis) dans un rayon de 3 cases augmentent de +10 %.
Lorsque la réserve de blessures d'un personnage hors-monde est inférieure à 50 %, toutes les chances de l'ensemble des créatures (y compris les ennemis) dans un rayon de 3 cases diminuent de −10 %.
languages.original_text:
While a voidborn character has more than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, all chances of all creatures (including enemies) in a 3-cell radius are increased by +10%.
While a voidborn character has less than 50% wounds, all chances of all creatures (including enemies) in a 3-cell radius are decreased by −10%.

traits.locale_text:
Lorsque la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} d'un personnage hors-monde est supérieure à 50 %, toutes les chances de l'ensemble des créatures (y compris les ennemis) dans un rayon de 3 cases augmentent de +10 %.
Lorsque la réserve de blessures d'un personnage hors-monde est inférieure à 50 %, toutes les chances de l'ensemble des créatures (y compris les ennemis) dans un rayon de 3 cases diminuent de −10 %.

languages.text:
当虚空之子的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}高于50%时，3格内所有生物（包括敌人）的所有掷骰成功率都会提高10%。
当虚空之子的生命值低于50%时，3格内所有生物（包括敌人）的所有掷骰成功率都会降低10%。
languages.original_text:
While a voidborn character has more than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, all chances of all creatures (including enemies) in a 3-cell radius are increased by +10%.
While a voidborn character has less than 50% wounds, all chances of all creatures (including enemies) in a 3-cell radius are decreased by −10%.

traits.locale_text:
当虚空之子的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}高于50%时，3格内所有生物（包括敌人）的所有掷骰成功率都会提高10%。
当虚空之子的生命值低于50%时，3格内所有生物（包括敌人）的所有掷骰成功率都会降低10%。

languages.text:
Cuando un personaje nacido en el vacío tiene más del 50 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}, todas las probabilidades de éxito de todas las criaturas en un radio de 3 casillas (incluyendo enemigos) aumentan un +10 %.
Cuando un personaje nacido en el vacío tiene menos del 50 % de sus heridas, todas las probabilidades de éxito de todas las criaturas en un radio de 3 casillas (incluyendo enemigos) se reducen un −10 %.
languages.original_text:
While a voidborn character has more than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, all chances of all creatures (including enemies) in a 3-cell radius are increased by +10%.
While a voidborn character has less than 50% wounds, all chances of all creatures (including enemies) in a 3-cell radius are decreased by −10%.

traits.locale_text:
Cuando un personaje nacido en el vacío tiene más del 50 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}, todas las probabilidades de éxito de todas las criaturas en un radio de 3 casillas (incluyendo enemigos) aumentan un +10 %.
Cuando un personaje nacido en el vacío tiene menos del 50 % de sus heridas, todas las probabilidades de éxito de todas las criaturas en un radio de 3 casillas (incluyendo enemigos) se reducen un -10 %.

languages.text:
虚空生まれのキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}が50%以上の時、周囲3セル以内のすべての生物（敵を含む）のすべての確率が+10%される。
虚空生まれのキャラクターの体力が50%以下の時、周囲3セル以内のすべての生物（敵を含む）のすべての確率が−10%される。

While a voidborn character has less than 50% wounds, all chances of all creatures (including enemies) in a 3-cell radius are decreased by −10%.
